inclusion.criterion: Two or more recurrences of C. difficile infection (CDI) with recurrence defined as a positive test result, e.g. Polymerase Chain Reaction (PCR) test and with appropriate symptoms within 2-8 weeks of last positive result, provided that symptoms from earlier episode resolved with or without therapy.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Failed standard therapy with oral metronidazole and/or oral vancomycin
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients with acute severe colonic dilation at risk for colonic perforation
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 55yo woman with h/o ESRD on HD and peritoneal dialysis who presented with watery, non bloody diarrhea and weakness. She has a history of 2 prior C diff infections, the most recent just 1 month ago.
